description:
Reki suffers heavy injuries in his beef against ADAM. Now, Langa must go on a beef against ADAM. Reki doesn`t want to feel what he has in the past and tells Langa to stop, but Langa`s strong determination is unwavering. Reki and Langa seek out Cherry blossom and JOE to hear more stories about ADAM. There, a tactical meeting in order to win against ADAM is held. Will Langa be able to defeat ADAM`s impregnable Love Hug?
Source: Funimation
